profile.name: Vivek V Pai
profile.title: Software Engineer
profile.summary: Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience across frontend, backend, mobile, and AI systems. Skilled in Angular, React, React Native Expo, and Django, with strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and essential AWS services. Hands-on experience building AI-driven applications using MCP servers, locally hosted LLMs via Ollama, and integrating intelligent automation into scalable web and mobile solutions. Experienced in writing effective test cases using Pytest, Selenium, and Jest.

responsibilities: Leading the complete ShopProp development team, overseeing mobile app development (React Native Expo), dashboard maintenance, architectural decisions, and feature rollout.
Enhanced product usability across Hireko & ShopProp by deploying Fastmcp Python to build MCP servers and integrating locally hosted LLMs via Ollama for AI-driven insights.
Integrated the ORCAsk AI chatbot into the ORCA platform and contributed to the Python SDK.
Developed automated frontend & backend test suites with Pytest & Selenium to achieve 85% code coverage.
Optimized V2.0 of the Property Search Page & Dashboard, achieving a 40% reduction in property API load times and a 71% decrease in map rendering times.
Significantly improved S3 storage and cost efficiency by 10% using AWS S3 technology.
Designed and developed MetricRealties, a SaaS product for real estate agents using Angular and AWS APIs, increasing agent productivity by 20%.
Integrated diverse REST APIs like AWS Lambda to drastically improve user experience and reduce load time.
Collaborated on the enhancement of a public page for a leading US real estate firm, increasing user engagement by 20%.
